connections 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Creates an RStudio IDE Contract object

connection_contract.Rd

Creates an RStudio IDE Contract object

connection_contract(spec = base_spec())

Arguments

spec

A list object that containing the structure of the Contract object

Examples


connection_contract()
#> $connectionObject
#> [1] ""
#> 
#> $type
#> [1] "type"
#> 
#> $host
#> [1] "host"
#> 
#> $displayName
#> [1] "name"
#> 
#> $connectCode
#> [1] ""
#> 
#> $disconnect
#> function () 
#> {
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x563fbee10488>
#> <environment: 0x563fb9988eb8>
#> 
#> $previewObject
#> function () 
#> {
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x563fbee10488>
#> <environment: 0x563fb9988eb8>
#> 
#> $listObjectTypes
#> function (...) 
#> {
#>     list(catalog = list(contains = list(schema = list(contains = list(table = list(contains = "data"), 
#>         view = list(contains = "data"))))))
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x563fbee0b538>
#> <environment: 0x563fb9988d30>
#> 
#> $listObjects
#> function (catalog = NULL, schema = NULL, ...) 
#> {
#>     if (is.null(catalog)) {
#>         return(get_object(spec, "catalogs")$data)
#>     }
#>     if (is.null(schema)) {
#>         ctls <- get_object(spec, "catalogs", catalog)
#>         return(get_object(ctls, "schemas")$data)
#>     }
#>     ctls <- get_object(spec, "catalogs", catalog)
#>     schs <- get_object(ctls, "schemas", schema)
#>     return(get_object(schs, "tables")$data)
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x563fbee0b068>
#> <environment: 0x563fb9988d30>
#> 
#> $listColumns
#> function (catalog = NULL, schema = NULL, table = NULL, view = NULL, 
#>     ...) 
#> {
#>     table_object <- paste0(table, view)
#>     ctls <- get_object(spec, "catalogs", catalog)
#>     schs <- get_object(ctls, "schemas", schema)
#>     tbls <- get_object(schs, "tables", table_object)
#>     get_object(tbls, "fields")$data
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x563fbee0db90>
#> <environment: 0x563fb9988d30>
#>
